<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Unified Alert</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v2/unified-alerts/{type}/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve a unified alert by its type and ID.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"type","in":"path","required":true,"description":"The type of the unified alert.","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"description":"The ID of the unified alert.","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Unified alert details.

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The ID of the unified alert."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"title"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The title of the unified alert."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"description"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"A description of the unified alert."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tags"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Tags associated with the unified alert."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"folderId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The folder ID where the alert is stored."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"dashboardId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The dashboard ID associated with the alert."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"panelId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The panel ID associated with the alert."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"runbook"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The runbook URL for the alert."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"rca"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether RCA (Root Cause Analysis) is enabled for the alert."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"rcaNotificationEndpointIds"} required={false} schemaName={"integer[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"integer"},"description":"Notification endpoint IDs for RCA."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"useAlertNotificationEndpointsForRca"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to use alert notification endpoints for RCA."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>recipients</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

Add email addresses and/or endpoint channels to automatically receive notifications with sample data when the alert triggers.

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"emails"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"Array of email addresses to be notified when the alert triggers.","items":{"type":"string","example":"tom.a@logz.io"}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"notificationEndpointIds"} required={false} schemaName={"int32[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"Array of IDs of pre-configured endpoint channels to notify when the alert triggers.","items":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>alertConfiguration</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"type"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`LOG_ALERT`, `METRIC_ALERT`]"} schema={{"type":"string","enum":["LOG_ALERT","METRIC_ALERT"],"description":"The type of the alert configuration."}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the alert is enabled."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"createdAt"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"The timestamp when the alert was created."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"updatedAt"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"The timestamp when the alert was last updated."}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"id\": \"string\",\n  \"title\": \"string\",\n  \"description\": \"string\",\n  \"tags\": [\n    \"string\"\n  ],\n  \"folderId\": \"string\",\n  \"dashboardId\": \"string\",\n  \"panelId\": \"string\",\n  \"runbook\": \"string\",\n  \"rca\": true,\n  \"rcaNotificationEndpointIds\": [\n    0\n  ],\n  \"useAlertNotificationEndpointsForRca\": true,\n  \"recipients\": {\n    \"emails\": [\n      \"tom.a@logz.io\"\n    ],\n    \"notificationEndpointIds\": [\n      0\n    ]\n  },\n  \"alertConfiguration\": {\n    \"type\": \"LOG_ALERT\"\n  },\n  \"enabled\": true,\n  \"createdAt\": 0,\n  \"updatedAt\": 0\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
